Caption: As a computer science major at CMU, I've done a few programming projects here and there...
Occasionally I do communication design projects as well, usually in the form of brochures or posters

I'm quite the extrovert and thus love being on stage. However, the human attention span is so short, that without eye candy it's likely the audience won't pay attention. So I've developmed my own style in slides.
That's right; I've done so many graphic tees, they deserve their own section.
Occasionally I'll find myself doing CD covers or game artwork for friends or friends of friends.
Sometimes I do things purely for fun.
